get in touch
		
	

	
		
			
  
    STRATEGY SERVICES
  


  
    
      
        STRATEGY SERVICES
        
          Unleash strategic excellence with ASTUDIO. Leveraging our partnerships with luxury brands and lifestyle-focused government departments, and our deep regional luxury market insights, we design strategies that empower your brand, captivating audiences and establishing brand leadership.
        
        
        
          Begin your strategic journey with us today.
        
        Contact Us
      
    
  
  
    
  


  
    
      Unleash strategic excellence with ASTUDIO. Leveraging our partnerships with luxury brands and lifestyle-focused government departments, and our deep regional luxury market insights, we design strategies that empower your brand, captivating audiences and establishing brand leadership.
        
        
          Begin your strategic journey with us today.
        
    Contact Us
  


		
	

	
		
			
		
	
our Strategy Services
	
		
			1.
Digital Strategy: At ASTUDIO, we devise comprehensive digital strategies that leverage various digital channels to achieve your business goals. Our expertise in SEO, social media marketing, email marketing, and content marketing ensures that your brand reaches the right audience at the right time, driving conversions and boosting your bottom line.

		
	

	
		
			2.
Brand Strategy: We help define your brand’s core values and unique selling propositions, setting you apart from your competitors. Our strategic approach ensures that your brand’s message is communicated effectively to your audience, fostering brand loyalty and driving business growth.

		
	

	
		
			3.
Content Strategy: Our team is adept at planning, creating, distributing, and measuring content across various platforms. We aim to provide valuable, relevant content to your audience, building trust, driving engagement, and ultimately leading to increased sales and customer retention.

		
	

	
		
		
			
		
	

	
		
			4.
Social Media Strategy: We plan and execute effective social media strategies tailored to your brand’s goals. From choosing the right platforms to creating engaging content and fostering audience interaction, we ensure your brand’s social media presence is strong, consistent, and results-driven.

		
	

	
		
			5.
Media Buying: Our team excels at strategic media buying, ensuring your ads reach the right audience at the right time. We negotiate and purchase ad spaces across various platforms, optimizing your ad spend for maximum ROI.

		
	

	
		
			6.
Data and Analytics Strategy: We use data and analytics to inform and improve your marketing decisions. By tracking your marketing performance and analyzing customer data, we provide actionable insights that lead to improved strategies, better customer engagement, and increased sales.

		
	

	
		
		
			
		
	

	
		
			
  Luxury Insights / Data-Driven Strategies / Brand Development / Strategic Partnerships / Media Buying / Sales Acceleration / 

		
	
Key benefits
	
		
			1.
Luxury Market Insight: We decode the regional luxury market, crafting strategies that resonate with your discerning audience, enhancing brand appeal and loyalty.

		
	

	
		
			2.
Innovative Strategies: Our team concocts tailored, innovative strategies that captivate your audience and drive tangible results, setting your brand apart.

		
	

	
		
			3.
Brand Amplification: We elevate your brand’s recognition, making it unforgettable in the luxury landscape, and setting you apart from competitors.

		
	

	
		
			4.
Audience Engagement: Our compelling content and social media strategies foster deep connections with your audience, sparking increased interaction and engagement.

		
	

	
		
			5.
Sales Acceleration: Our strategies, designed with your business goals at the core, drive conversions, widen audience reach, and accelerate sales growth.

		
	

	
		
			6.
Committed Partnership: Choosing ASTUDIO means choosing a committed partner. We align our strategies with your vision, supporting your brand’s growth and thriving success in the luxury market.

		
	

	
		
		
			
		
	
STRATEGY CASE STUDIES
	
		
		
			
		
	

	 			
					
						
						Vogue & WIRED X NEOM
						
					
				
			
	
		
			We were commissioned by Vogue Arabia and WIRED ME to document four Saudi women as they explore what NEOM has to offer, from wellbeing and personal discovery, to sustainability and…

		
	

	
		
		
			
		
	

	 			
					
						
						PIAGET RAMADAN – #TURNLIFEON
						
					
				
			
	
		
			A bold, visual art film creatively developed, directed and produced by ASTUDIO for Piaget to mark Ramadan 2022, shot in the breathtaking destination of AlUla, Saudi Arabia.

		
	

	
		
		
			
		
	

	 			
					
						
						Sharjah Events
						
					
				
			
	
		
			Working closely with Sharjah Government Media Bureau, we created a vibrant and engaging brand identity that attracted both local residents and tourists.
Our creative campaigns utilized a mix of traditional and digital media, and our copywriting team crafted compelling messages that highlighted the diverse range and rich cultural lifestyle of Sharjah. The result was a significant increase in social media reach, event attendance and community engagement.

		
	

	
		
		
			
		
	

	 			
					
						
						Strategizing success for Rana Mikdashi Jewellery
						
					
				
			
	
		
			Drawing people to the eccentric spirit and perpetual style of Rana Mikdashi Jewellery through an engaging digital marketing strategy.

		
	

	
		
		
			
		
	

	 			
					
						
						EXPERIENCE OMAN – A 360 ROADMAP
						
					
				
			
	
		
			A roadmap for success: Designing a 360-degree digital strategy for Experience Oman to increase its presence online and meet sustained goals.

		
	

	
		
			ASTUDIO has had the privilege of working with a diverse range of clients in the strategy services domain, including:

		
	

	
		
			Bvlgari

		
	

	
		
			Piaget

		
	

	
		
			L’AZURDE

		
	

	
		
			Neom

		
	

	
		
			Vogue Arabia

		
	

	
		
			Sharjah Safari

		
	

	
		
			Ether

		
	

	
		
			Step into the strategic excellence of ASTUDIO – let’s craft your blueprint and establish your brand’s market leadership.

		
	
get in touch
	
		
			case studies
			
				
					
						
							B FOR BEIRUT BVLGARI
						
						BVLGARI partnered with Save the Children and required a film to raise awareness and donations. Learn more about ASTUDIO's approach and end-result here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							BVLGARI Jannah, a Five-Petal Story
						
						This campaign features the launch of BVLGARI’s exclusive Jannah jewellery collection, which premiered at Louvre Abu Dhabi. Have a look at the case study.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							MANDARIN ORIENTAL EMIRATES PALACE
						
						For the launch of the Emirates Palace Mandarin Oriental in Abu Dhabi, we were tasked to create an exceptional film to showcase the hotel. See more here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Experience Oman OmanByYou
						
						With the help of ASTUDIO, #OmanByYou was the first social media activation by a tourism board that only used UGC for marketing. Read the full brief here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							MFDP LEGAL
						
						ASTUDIO redefined MFDP's brand, developing contemporary design based on insights about the legal industry.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Wego - Holidays
						
						For Wego Arabia’s 2018 summer ad campaign, our brief was to convince consumers to book their holiday online with Wego. Have a look at the case study here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							RANA MIKDASHI
						
						We were tasked with creating a complete digital strategy for Rana Mikdashi, a handcrafted, sculptural jewellery brand. Have a look at our strategy here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Sharjah Events - 2021 Calendar #SeeSharjah
						
						Sharjah Events launched their 2021 Calendar online to promote big events and activities for the year. Our job was to create an engaging digital strategy.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							THAT CONCEPT STORE
						
						THAT Concept Store, a brand new retail experience inside Mall of the Emirates, was in need of a launch campaign to challenge the norm. Here's what we did.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Experience Oman - Love Summer Again
						
						ASTUDIO created a summer destination campaign for Experience Oman. Have a look at the full brief, our approach and the results in the case study here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							BVLGARI WONDERS OF LOVE
						
						"The Wonders of Love," showcases love as a universal concept flowing through Ramadan. Through our film campaign, we highlight the brand identity and V in BVLGARI, sharing the wonders of love with V stories that are localized for our Ramadan campaign.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Experience Oman - A 360 Roadmap
						
						ASTUDIO designed a 360-degree digital strategy for Experience Oman to increase its presence online and meet goals. Find out more about our strategy here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Piaget Ramadan #TurnLifeOn
						
						Luxury Swiss watchmaker and jewellery brand, Piaget, wanted to mark Ramadan 2022 with a modern campaign for its Possession collection. Here's what we did.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Vyntage Horology
						
						ASTUDIO crafted Vyntage's identity, where modern Emirati vision meets the meticulousness of Swiss watchmaking.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Experience Oman Website Wonder
						
						Our aim was to design a mobile-friendly, accessible and beautiful website for Experience Oman. Have a look at our approach and the end-result here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Vogue & WIRED X NEOM
						
						ASTUDIO was commissioned by Vogue Arabia and WIRED ME to document four Saudi women as they explore what NEOM has to offer. View the end-result here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							SÉLECT LABEL
						
						ASTUDIO combined SELECT LABEL's heritage with modern branding, crafting a captivating narrative showcasing luxury and innovation.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							VOGUE ARABIA FINDING MĀ
						
						ASTUDIO produced a dynamic fashion film for Vogue Arabia where East meets West, which ended up being shortlisted by the London Fashion Film Festival.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							ELIE SAAB TIMEPIECES
						
						ASTUDIO was asked to lead the creative and production of the launch campaign for ELIE SAAB Timepieces. Find out more about our marketing approach here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Oman in Venice Art Biennale
						
						We were briefed to position Oman as a top travel destination and get travellers in Venice to visit the Oman Pavilion. Read the complete case study here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							ETHER BY CLOUD SPACES
						
						ASTUDIO's brief was to build an identity, positioning and strategy for the revolutionary retail experience, Ether by Cloud Spaces. Here's what we did.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							HADARA MAGAZINE
						
						For this project, we were tasked to create synergy across Hadara Magazine’s offline and online presence. Find out how we accomplished that.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Mandarin Oriental Social Strategy
						
						The five-star Mandarin Oriental Jumeira in Dubai wanted to stand out from its competitors on social media. Find out exactly how ASTUDIO achieved this.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							L’AZURDE - Nuit Blanche
						
						Our brief was to create an aspirational film for L'azurde that highlights their breath-taking jewellery and celebrates the New Year. Here's what we did.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							STORE OF THE FUTURE
						
						ASTUDIO produced over 340 pieces of content to be showcased in Store of the Future when the store opened its doors in Mall of the Emirates. Find out more.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Azza Fahmy Real Love
						
						Approaching their 50th anniversary, Azza Fahmy Jewellery wanted to create a standout social media campaign for Mother’s Day. View the case study here.

			Marketing strategy services that drive results
Success starts with a plan. With industry leading expertise in digital marketing strategy, branding strategy, social media strategy, video marketing strategy, e-commerce marketing strategy and content strategy, we’ve got a plan that’s going to blow the lights out.
 STRATEGIC MARKETING CONSULTANTS
Running a successful business demands a solid foundation that determines how you’re going to position your brand and reach your sales and business objectives. That’s what a strategic marketing plan is for. It’s the map that shows you how you will set actionable goals and the digital, social, or visual elements needed for your company to thrive in this competitive environment. Whatever challenges you’re facing, our forward-thinking strategic marketing consultants will provide a custom-tailored plan to determine the most effective path to your company’s growth.
COMPETITIVE ANALYSIS AND PRODUCT MARKET FIT
Our marketing strategy services include detailed competitive analysis and our product marketing strategy provides a 360-degree view of your brand and product(s), giving you insight into their compatibility and competition within your unique verticals.
 DIGITAL DISCOVERY AND ROADMAP PLANNING
Our digital discovery and road map package provides an end-to-end digital and social marketing roadmap based on a detailed brand audit, market research, and competitive analysis. Which is why we’re the strategic marketing agency in Dubai you should be talking to.
 UNDERSTANDING YOUR AUDIENCE
To create concepts that will resonate with your target audience, first, we need to understand your brand, your customers, and your goals. We will listen to you and get to know your brand inside out. Understanding your products, services and the needs of your customers is a crucial first step in creating a strong branding strategy that includes digital, social, and visual tactics.
 USE DATA AND ANALYTICS
Online video and photography content should spark conversations, and that involves thinking about the audience, the platform, and the purpose behind the visuals. We use data and analytics to drive sound business decisions, design an effective strategy and craft your visual content around trends, popular video types, and video duration in order to maximize your customer engagement.
 VIDEO THAT STANDS OUT
The enormous volume of video content online creates a challenge for brands that want to stand out and grab the attention of viewers. Content needs to grab your attention quickly. To create connections, we design the perfect video marketing strategy that combines traditional formats with new experimental formats to find out what works best for your brand.
Marketing strategy services in Dubai
Our experienced marketing experts provide strategic marketing services to brands in Dubai and across the globe. They have the expertise to develop a short-term or long-term marketing strategy for your digital, social and visual campaigns that show you the roadmap on how to beat your competition, meet your business objectives for today, and position your company for future growth.
Ready to get strategic? Contact our team today about our different strategy services, creative services or digital marketing services in Dubai and the rest of the region.
